title: RITES Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 30 Senior Technical Assistant Posts
description: The Rail India Technical and Economic Services Limited (RITES) has officially released the notification to fill 30 Senior Technical Assistant posts. The interested applicants can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their Diploma in Civil Engineering can apply for the RITES Recruitment 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process,...
